definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]

sentences.english: Every year people of a hundred more died in the match.
sentences.chinese: 每年因械斗而死的人数总在百人以上。

sentences.english: The fight between the two villages must be broken up.
sentences.chinese: 这两个村子的械斗必须被制止。

sentences.english: Several students were involved in the fighting.
sentences.chinese: 有几个学生涉入那场械斗。

sentences.english: Which means its a movie full of giant space robots beating the crap out of each other.
sentences.chinese: 这就是说该片充满了巨大的机器人械斗的场面。

sentences.english: Sneaking water often caused serious fight.
sentences.chinese: 盗用井水经常引起械斗。

sentences.english: I'm not interested in songs about gangsters and drive-by shootings.
sentences.chinese: 我对于帮派和械斗枪战的这些歌没什么兴趣。

sentences.english: Which means it's a movie full of giant space robots beating the crap out of each other.
sentences.chinese: 这说该片充满了巨大的机器人械斗的场面。

sentences.english: Weapon fight between Black and White Banners was a major event in Putian countryside in modern times.
sentences.chinese: 乌白旗械斗是莆田近代农村曾发生过的一项重大事件。

definition: to have a fist fight/fist fight/brawl
to cause trouble/to provoke a dispute
to cause trouble/to create a disturbance
to pick a quarrel/to start a fight
